name: Diamondz
overview: Diamondz is a puzzle game. You progress through a series of boards claiming diamonds, once you clear all the diamonds you have finished the board and move to the next. You are represented by a graphical plus sign; when you start movement left/right or up/down you can't stop unless something blocks you. The puzzle to a level is to make the right moves to be stopped in ways that allow you to claim diamonds.
